== Biography ==
Currently I work at Simon Property Group home office in Indianapolis.  I am a PC Support Technician who images PC's and Laptop's.  Also, I provide technical support to the whole SPG office both US and International.  As of right now I am going to IUPUI in Indianapolis to get my Computer Information Technology degree focusing in networking.  Already I have my Associates Degree.  Once I am finished with my college education I plan to try and work at a IT job wherever that may be.  My plan is to work as a Network Analyst, PC Analyst, or Navy.
